3: Did we... succeed?
It only adjusted its form temporarily... There's no substantial change...
In that case... Let's keep suppressing it!
Sooner or later, we'll find its weak point!
Time to take out your secret weapon, don't you think?

2: ...I don't know what you're talking about, Watanabe.

3: Watanabe... How did you know...
...You've done so much preparation. I would be a fool if I couldn't guess it already.
Watanabe looks at the satellite outside.
That's more than just a communication relay station, isn't it?
Yes...
Tell me how to use it.

4: We weren't hiding it on purpose.

3: Of course, I understand you have your concerns.
...I understand.
Connecting—
Hello? Can you hear me?
The railgun was fully charged long ago!
It's still a work in progress here. Wait for my signal.
Who are you? You look familiar though.
Where's Gray Raven?
We had a discussion and decided that I would be the best candidate to fire the Prism.
He's right...
I see. So the people in the office have already granted the permission... Alright.
Hmph, Lucia... I've never seen you like this.
The energy level of the core is rising again after the transformation!
Now I'm curious how many forms it can have.
The Prism needs more time to stabilize and aim for best accuracy.
Understood.
Keep attacking...
From now on, I'll try to expose its weakness.
